page.title: 03A SCHOOLBOY'S DAY
page.content: On a normal schoolday I wake at half past seven.I usualy stay in bed for about five minutes.Once I am up I go to the bathroom and get dressed .Then I go downstairs and have some breakfast .I make myself a cup of tea and eat some rice crispies .I get my school bag and go to school. I wait for my friends to come.When everybody has arrived we have assembly. When it is finished we have maths and English.Then we have playtime.When we come back in we do reading.Then our teacher talks to us about something.We have lunch snd pack the tables.After that we have a story.Then we go home.I play with my computer then watch television. at about half past eight I go to bed.
